user.text: it is showing "Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card. We are unable to process your request: Transaction Rejected"

agent.speaker: agent
agent.text: The error message "Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card. We are unable to process your request: Transaction Rejected" might be due to IBM Cloud® was unable to process your transaction. You can contact the Cloud Trust and Enablement team by email at verify@us.ibm.com. to resolve this issue.

contexts.text:
Problem authorizing the credit card. We're afraid this transaction has been rejected. Inactive card or card not authorized for card-not-present transactions.

 Why it’s happening 

Some credit card issuers don't allow transactions when it is being initiated by using a credit card on file. You might see this error message if your credit card has been deactivated.

 How to fix it 

Contact your credit card issuer for more information.





 Why is my credit card not authorized to place an order? 

 What’s happening 

You tried to place an order in the IBM Cloud console [Payments page](https://cloud.ibm.com/billing/payments), but you get the following error message:

> Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card.

 Why it’s happening 

Your credit card issuer has declined the transaction.

 How to fix it 

Contact your credit card issuer for more information.





 Why is IBM Cloud unable to process my order request? 

 What’s happening 

You tried to place an order in the IBM Cloud console [Payments page](https://cloud.ibm.com/billing/payments), but you get the following error message:

> Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card. We are unable to process your request: Transaction Rejected. Please contact Cloud Trust Enablement at [verify@us.ibm.com](mailto:verify@us.ibm.com).

 Why it’s happening 

IBM Cloud® was unable to process your transaction.

 How to fix it 

Contact the Cloud Trust and Enablement team by email at [verify@us.ibm.com](mailto:verify@us.ibm.com).





 Why was my change request rejected? 

 What’s happening 

You tried to place an order in the IBM Cloud console [Payments page](https://cloud.ibm.com/billing/payments), but you get one of the following error messages:

> Failed to complete the Change Request process due to the following error: We're afraid this transaction has been rejected. Invalid account number.

or

ml.tokens.model_text: Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card. We are unable to process your request: Transaction Rejected

agent.original_text: The error message "Could not place order. Problem authorizing the credit card. We are unable to process your request: Transaction Rejected" typically means that your credit card issuer has declined the transaction. This could be due to various reasons such as insufficient funds, reaching the credit limit, or potential fraud activity. To resolve this issue, you should contact your credit card issuer for more information. If the problem persists, you may also consider using a different credit card or payment method.

llm_based_tags.reasoning: The query starts with 'it is showing' where 'it' is an unresolved pronoun with no clear referent. Without context, we cannot determine what system, application, or website is displaying this error. The error message itself is complete, but the subject performing the action is missing.
